longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of normal passports issued to nationals of Ukraine.
Minors:
- Minors under 14 years of age  
Additional Information:
- The max. stay is granted within 6 months to visa exempt
  nationals. 
 - not applicable to holders of normal passports issued to
   nationals of Ukraine. 
- The max. stay is granted within 2 months to holders of
  normal passports issued to nationals of Ukraine.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
shortInfo: 30 дней в течение каждых двух месяцев
